data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borovec, Roman, Oberprieler, Rolf G. (2013): Afrophloeus, a new genus of African weevils of the tribe Embrithini (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae), with description of a new species and notes on the composition of Embrithini. Zootaxa 3693 (3): 365-378, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.223111
